## Data file

This file contains the datasets used for the creation of the app. There is an RDS file and a CSV file for the Hardship Index calculated by UIC's Great Cities Institute with 2010-2014 data. The folder also contains the RDS files for the newly calculated Hardship Index with data from 2012-2016 and  for the geographic data for mapping community areas.
